SEARCH
Package model

Class ReadXSystems

java.lang.Object
model.ReadXSystems
public class ReadXSystems extends Object
The ReadXSystems class represents a system for managing bibliographic products and users.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    COLUMN
    The number of columns for the library.
    static final int
    ROW
    The number of rows for the library

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    ReadXSystems()
    Constructs a ReadXSystems object with an empty list of products and users.

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      public String addBook(String name, int numPages, String review, Calendar publicationDate, int genreOption, String url, Double price)
      Adds a book to the system with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the book
      numPages - the number of pages in the book
      review - the review of the book
      publicationDate - the publication date of the book
      genreOption - the genre option of the book
      url - the URL of the book
      price - the price of the book
      Returns:
      a message indicating the success of the operation and the identifier of the registered product

    • generateHexIdentifier

      public String generateHexIdentifier()
      Generates a hexadecimal identifier for the products.
      Returns:
      the generated hexadecimal identifier

    • addMagazine

      public String addMagazine(String name, int numPages, Calendar publicationDate, int categoryOption, String url, Double price, String periodicityEmission)
      Adds a magazine to the system with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the magazine
      numPages - the number of pages in the magazine
      publicationDate - the publication date of the magazine
      categoryOption - the category option of the magazine
      url - the URL of the magazine
      price - the price of the magazine
      periodicityEmission - the periodicity emission of the magazine
      Returns:
      a message indicating the success of the operation and the identifier of the registered product

      public String generateAlphaIdentifier()

    • modifyBookInfo

      public String modifyBookInfo(int bookPosition, String name, int numPages, String review, Calendar publicationDate, int genreOption, String url, Double price)
      Modifies the information of a book in the system.
      Parameters:
      bookPosition - the position of the book to modify on the list
      name - the new name of the book
      numPages - the new number of pages in the book
      review - the new review of the book
      publicationDate - the new publication date of the book
      genreOption - the new genre option of the book
      url - the new URL of the book
      price - the new price of the book
      Returns:
      a message indicating the success of the operation

    • modifyMagazineInfo

      public String modifyMagazineInfo(int magazinePosition, String name, int numPages, Calendar publicationDate, int categoryOption, String url, Double price, String periodicityEmission)
      Modifies the information of a magazine in the system.
      Parameters:
      magazinePosition - the position of the magazine to modify on the list
      name - the new name of the magazine
      numPages - the new number of pages in the magazine
      publicationDate - the new publication date of the magazine
      categoryOption - the new category option of the magazine
      url - the new URL of the magazine
      price - the new price of the magazine
      periodicityEmission - the new periodicity emission of the magazine.
      Returns:
      a message indicating the success of the operation

    • eliminateBibliographicProductFromSystem

      public boolean eliminateBibliographicProductFromSystem(String productID)
      Removes a bibliographic product from the system.
      Parameters:
      productID - the ID of the product to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully removed, false otherwise

      public String addRegularUser(String name, String cc)
      Adds a regular user to the system.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the user
      cc - the identification number of the user
      Returns:
      a message indicating the successful registration of the user

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a message indicating the successful registration of the user

    • isCCAlreadyRegistered

      public boolean isCCAlreadyRegistered(String cc)
      Checks if a given credit card number (cc) is already registered by any user.
      Parameters:
      cc - the credit card number to check.
      Returns:
      true if the credit card number is already registered, false otherwise.

    • addBibliographicProductToUser

      public String addBibliographicProductToUser(String userCC, String productID, Double paidAmount)
      Adds a bibliographic product to a user's account and completes the payment.
      Parameters:
      userCC - the identification number of the user
      productID - the ID of the bibliographic product to be purchased
      paidAmount - the amount paid for the product
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the transaction

    • eliminateMagazineFromUser

      public String eliminateMagazineFromUser(String userCC, String magazineID)
      Eliminates a magazine subscription from a user's account.
      Parameters:
      userCC - the identification number of the user
      magazineID - the ID of the magazine to be eliminated
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the operation

    • showUsersLibrary

      public String showUsersLibrary(int userPosition, int shelve)
      Displays the user's library, showing the content of a specific shelf.
      Parameters:
      userPosition - the searched user position.
      shelve - the shelf number to display
      Returns:
      a message containing the content of the specified shelf in the user's library

    • initLibrary

      public List<BibliographicProduct[][]> initLibrary(User user)
      Initializes the library for a user by organizing their owned products by the publication date into shelves.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose library is being initialized
      Returns:
      a list of shelves containing the user's owned products

    • getProductPositionByCordinates

      public int getProductPositionByCordinates(int x, int y, int shelve, int userPosition)
      Retrieves the position of a product in a user's owned products list based on its coordinates in the library.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the product in the library
      y - the y-coordinate of the product in the library
      shelve - the index of the shelve containing the product
      userPosition - the position of the user in the users list
      Returns:
      the position of the searched product in the user's owned products list

    • showReadingSession

      public String showReadingSession(int userPosition, int productPosition)
      Displays the information about a reading session for a specific user and product.
      Parameters:
      userPosition - the position of the user in the users list
      productPosition - the position of the product in the user's owned products list
      Returns:
      a string containing the details of the reading session and options to navigate through the pages

    • changePage

      public String changePage(int userPosition, int productPosition, String action)
      Changes the page of a reading session based on the user's action.
      Parameters:
      userPosition - the position of the user in the users list
      productPosition - the position of the product in the user's owned products list
      action - the action performed by the user ('A' for next page, 'S' for previous page, 'B' for exit)
      Returns:
      a string containing the message and any additional information related to the page change

    • initModel

      public String initModel()
      Initializes the model by generating random products and users, and assigning purchases to users.
      Returns:
      a string containing information about the generated products, users, and their acquisitions

    • getTotalPagesReadByType

      public String getTotalPagesReadByType()
      Retrieves the total number of pages read for each type of product (books and magazines).
      Returns:
      a string containing the total number of pages read for books and magazines

    • getMostReadGenreAndCategory

      public String getMostReadGenreAndCategory()
      Retrieves the most read genre and category based on the total number of pages read.
      Returns:
      a string containing the most read genre and category with their respective total pages read

    • getTop5BookList

      public String getTop5BookList()
      Retrieves a list of the top 5 most read books.
      Returns:
      a string containing the information of the top 5 books, including name, genre, and read pages.

    • getTop5MagazinesList

      public String getTop5MagazinesList()
      Retrieves a list of the top 5 most read magazines.
      Returns:
      a string containing the information of the top 5 magazines, including name, category, and read pages.

    • informSalesByGenre

      public String informSalesByGenre()
      Retrieves sales and revenue information by genre.
      Returns:
      a string containing the sales and revenue information for each genre.

    • informSalesByCategory

      public String informSalesByCategory()
      Retrieves sales and revenue information by category.
      Returns:
      a string containing the sales and revenue information for each category.

    • searchBibliographicProductByID

      public BibliographicProduct searchBibliographicProductByID(String searchedProductID)
      Searches for a bibliographic product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      searchedProductID - the ID of the product to search for.
      Returns:
      the bibliographic product found, or null if no product matches the ID.

    • searchBibliographicProductArrayPosition

      public int searchBibliographicProductArrayPosition(String searchedProductID)
      Searches for the position of a bibliographic product in the array based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      searchedProductID - the ID of the product to search for.
      Returns:
      the position of the product in the array, or -1 if the product is not found.

    • searchUserByCC

      public User searchUserByCC(String searchedUserCC)
      Searches for a user in the user list based on their CC number.
      Parameters:
      searchedUserCC - the CC number of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      the User object if found, or null if the user is not found.

    • searchUserArrayPosition

      public int searchUserArrayPosition(String searchedUserCC)
      Searches for the position of a user in the user list based on their CC number.
      Parameters:
      searchedUserCC - the CC number of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      the index of the user in the user list if found, or -1 if the user is not found.

    • getCurrentDate

      public Calendar getCurrentDate()
      Retrieves the current date as a Calendar object.
      Returns:
      the current date.

    • checkProductType

      public int checkProductType(String productID)
      Checks the type of a bibliographic product based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      productID - the ID of the product to check.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the product type: 0 for Book, 1 for Magazine, and -1 if the product is not found.

    • checkUserType

      public int checkUserType(String usersCC)
      Checks the type of a user based on their CC (Credit Card) number.
      Parameters:
      usersCC - the CC number of the user to check.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the user type: 0 for Regular user, 1 for Premium user, and -1 if the user is not found.

    • getProductByPositon

      public BibliographicProduct getProductByPositon(int position)
      Retrieves a bibliographic product from the products list based on its position
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the product in the list.
      Returns:
      the bibliographic product at the specified position.

      public Book getProductCastedBook(int position)

      Returns:
      the book at the specified position.

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • getAdvertisement

      public String getAdvertisement(User user)
      Generates an advertisement message for the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user for whom to generate the advertisement.
      Returns:
      the generated advertisement message, or an empty string if the user is not advertisable.
